explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, a red-haired girl and a green-haired person appear in the frame. On the left is a red-haired girl wearing a red top and black skirt, covering her mouth with her right hand, looking down. The green-haired person is wearing camouflage clothing and a military green beret, looking sideways at the red-haired girl. The background is a light-colored wall and a black door.

[0-2] First, the green-haired person takes out a green knife from the right side and points it at the red-haired girl. He widens his eyes, opens his mouth, revealing sharp teeth. The subtitle "Fake knife with a yellow exclamation mark" appears on the upper right. The red-haired girl stares to the right with wide eyes and moves her body. The scene switches, the subtitles disappear. A purple-haired girl wearing a white sweater and a white wool hat looks to the left. She turns her head to the front and looks up and down. There are some cabinets in the background.
